description: Ripping through the Highlands, the golden eagle guided us form above, the brilliant, blooming thistle lined the roadside, and the Scottish Saltire hung from the door of every pub. The Chiller series of boardshorts feature lightweight cotton blended fabric with side seam hand pockets. A thin and dynamic waistband construction simplifies the style to combine a relaxed looking and performance constructed boardshort for the beach, boat or pool. The velcro back patch pocket comes with an internal key loop.
name: Roark Chiller Emblems Boardshort - Mens
